title: Monroe Beach
description: Once again, Judith McCain returns to Monroe Beach to help Sarah James who keeps seeing women in her mirror who end up dead on the beach. She dreams of the killer but can't make out his face. She finally sees herself in the mirror and is afraid for her life. The stress from all of this is causing her other personalities to comeout.Judith is called upon by the FBI to profile the killer who appears to rape his victims, dress them in a white robe and then drown them. Judith feels at a loss to help Sarah and calls Deliliah, who you met in the first book and who has mystical insight, to help. The three of them end up going to Florida to get the help of Dr. Anna, psychiatrist and owner of The White Sands Psychiatric Center to help them. While they are trying to help Sarah and to find out who the killer is, Dr. Anna finds that she has demons of her own to deal with.
author: Peggy Holloway
